text: There Is Only You may refer to: *There Is Only You (album), 2014 album by The Xcerts *"There Is Only You", song by Human Drama from the albums Fourteen Thousand Three Hundred Eighty Four Days Later and Feel (Human Drama album) *"There Is Only You", 1998 song by Christian rock band Smalltown Poets from Listen Closely *"There Is Only You", song by Roy Rogers (guitarist) from Slideways
title: There Is Only You
